stimulusHtml: Which of the following is a characteristic of the Bamiyan Buddhas that reflects the influence of other artistic traditions fostered by Bamiyanâ€™s location on the Silk Road?
choicesHtml: Robes that are painted in complementary colors, influenced by Early Christian style
Realistically draping folds of the robes, influenced by Hellenistic Greek style
Columnar folds of the robes that create an elongated appearance, influenced by Early Gothic style
Garments that are belted at the waist, influenced by the style of Old Kingdom Egypt
